name: @salesforce/salesforcedx-icons
description: Icon fonts for Salesforce's VSCode extensions.

scripts.svgo: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do svgo -f ./src/${dir}/icons/ --config svgo.config.js; done
scripts.sprite: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do node ./scripts/svg-sprite.js --outDir dist/${dir} --iconSet ${dir} --outFile ${dir}.svg; done
scripts.export-ts: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do node ./scripts/export-ts.js -f ./src/${dir}/template/mapping.json > ./dist/${dir}/${dir}Library.ts; done
scripts.export-csv: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do node ./scripts/export-csv.js -f ./dist/${dir}/${dir}.ttf > ./dist/${dir}/${dir}.csv; done
scripts.fonts: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do fantasticon --config ./src/$dir/fantasticon.js; done
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run svgo && npm run fonts && npm run export-ts && npm run export-csv && npm run sprite
scripts.open: for dir in seti-icons sfdx-icons; do open ./dist/${dir}/${dir}.html; done
